text.title: part3_BDSM as business: Interviews with Dominatrixes
text.p:
Jada :
Like if you were a stripper or something like that .
You ca n’t be a forty year old stripper ; whereas a 40 year old Dom is like a Godsend !

p.s: I do n’t know if people really know that .
And there ’s people like The Baroness , who is older , and she is very much involved in the scene .
Although I do n’t know if she ’d consider herself professional .

hi.s: DS : How long do you see yourself doing this , Jada ?

text.p:
Jada :
I honestly could n’t say .
It ’s the same thing .

hi.s: DS : It ’s open-ended , but you do see it coming to an end at some point ?

text.p:
Jada :
Well , yeah , all things come to an end at some point no matter what ’s going to happen .
It ’s always going to be something I enjoy ; I took a break for a couple of months and then found myself coming back because I missed it .
It could be the same thing .
At any given time I could suddenly be like , “ You know , I ’m not sure . ”

head.s: What they get asked to do

caption.s:
Alex in The Blue Room with a
St. Andrew 's Cross
.

hi.s: DS : What would be a typical request ?

p.s:
I do n’t know if I can really say that , because everyone is
so
specific .

I mean , there are things you get requested for much more often , like
foot worship
or
boot worship
.
That ’s something that comes up a lot …

text.p:
Jada :
And even if it ’s not , you tend to incorporate it .
[ Giggles ]

hi.s: DS : What happens in a foot worship session ?

p.s: It ’s again , even though it sounds straight-forward , and I could see where people would think foot worship is one thing , but it manifests itself in so many different ways .

Some people like to be
stepped on with feet
, some people just like to look at them , others like to lick boots , some like to kiss toes , some like to rub feet —

text.p:
Alex :
It ’s kind of endless .
As many individuals as there are , they have a different approach to it .
And that ’s what I find fascinating .
I always wonder , and sometimes ask them .

hi.s: DS : Are your reactions scripted by them , such as whether you act disgusted or happy ?

text.p:
Alex :
Definitely .
Some people make requests and say things like , “ I like it when my Mistress is very strict with me ” ; others say , “ I like it when it is just more conversational and when you are just being real . ”
Jada and I have sessioned together , and I think we are both pretty
intuitive
and even if they do n’t say , we sort of pick up on it .

Jada :
Certain vibes that you get from
